description:
Winner of the 2014 Parents’ Choice Recommended Mobile App.  National Geographic Kids magazine for iPad is packed with engaging interactive content that boasts fun and learning for both kids and parents!  The perfect magazine for ages 6 and up!  Print subscribers can now get complimentary access! Magazine features include…

• Animal stories
• Weird-but-true facts
• Lively “My Shot Minute” videos—View reader-submitted photos.
• Photo galleries—See photographs not included in the print version.
• Funny Fill-In word games
• Photo games
• Cool quizzes
• Puzzles, jokes, and more

Here are the details on subscription* offer:

Annual subscription: $19.99 (10 issues)
Monthly subscription: $1.99 per month (10 issues)
Single issues: $3.99/issue
Back issues of National Geographic Kids magazine are available starting with our June/July 2011 issue.

• Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
• No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
• Privacy Policy and Terms of Use can be found here: http://www.nationalgeographic.com/community/privacy_complete.html

Need help with linking your print subscription? Contact us at NGKIDSDigital@CustomerSvc.com or call 1-866-808-0841

We want to continue to make your National Geographic Kids iPad experience more engaging and fun. Feedback is important to us, so please be sure to link to our reader survey by tapping the button on the table of contents page. 

National Geographic Kids is published ten times a year by the National Geographic Society, a brand trusted by parents and educators. National Geographic Kids magazine’s numerous honors include the Association of Educational Publishers’ Periodical of the Year and a Golden Lamp Award, Parents Choice Gold and Silver Awards, a Parent’s Guide Children’s Media Award, the Folio Editorial Excellence Award, and an Ozzie Award for Design Excellence.

* Actual charges might be converted to local currency depending on your country of residence.
releaseNotes: Minor bug fixes (mostly for iOS8 users)
